title: Stage 6 Load Shedding Alert
message: Eskom has implemented Stage 6 load shedding effective immediately due to multiple unit trips at Kusile and Matla power stations. Estimated duration: 72 hours. All government facilities should activate backup generation.

title: End of Load Shedding - System Normalised
message: Eskom is pleased to announce that load shedding has been suspended effective 25 March 2024 due to improved generation fleet performance and reduced demand. All 6 Kusile units and 6 Medupi units now operational.

title: NERSA Tariff Decision - 18.65% Increase Approved
message: NERSA has approved an electricity tariff increase of 18.65% effective 1 April 2024. This exceeds the initial Eskom application. DPE and National Treasury to be notified. Customer communication plan to be activated.

title: Eskom Annual Financial Statements Due
message: Reminder: Audited Annual Financial Statements for FY2023/24 are due for submission to the Auditor-General of South Africa (AGSA) by 30 November 2024. Finance division to ensure all supporting schedules are complete.

title: Medupi Unit 3 Unplanned Outage
message: Unit 3 at Medupi Power Station has tripped due to a boiler tube failure. Estimated repair time: 3 weeks. Loss of 794MW from the national grid. Maintenance teams deployed. Load shedding risk elevated to Stage 2.

title: Transmission Entity Unbundling Milestone
message: National Transmission Company of South Africa (NTCSA) has been formally registered as a separate entity in terms of the Electricity Regulation Amendment Act. This is a major structural milestone.

title: SAA Business Rescue Concluded
message: The business rescue process for South African Airways has been formally concluded. SAA has been recapitalised with R10.5bn in government funding and is cleared for relaunch operations. New management team in place.

title: SAA Relaunch - Operations Commence
message: South African Airways has successfully relaunched with domestic flights from O.R. Tambo International Airport to Cape Town and Johannesburg effective 23 September 2021. International routes to be reinstated progressively.

title: SAA Strategic Equity Partner Selection
message: The process for selecting a Strategic Equity Partner (SEP) for SAA has been initiated. Expressions of interest from qualified aviation investors are being evaluated. Decision expected by Q3 2024.

title: SAA Mass Retrenchment Notice
message: Pursuant to the Section 189A notice issued during business rescue, SAA is regrettably proceeding with the retrenchment of 4,703 employees. Consultation process with NUM, SACCA and NUMSA is concluded.

title: SAA Fleet Delay - Aircraft Delivery Postponed
message: Airbus has notified SAA of a 6-month delay in delivery of the first A320neo aircraft under the fleet rejuvenation programme. Revised delivery date is Q2 2026. Impact on route expansion plan being assessed.

title: Transnet Port of Durban Congestion - Critical
message: Container backlog at Durban Harbour has reached critical levels with over 8,000 TEU delays. Vessel waiting times averaging 7 days. Emergency operations centre activated. SAPS and SANDF support requested for security.

title: Transnet Freight Rail Strike Notice
message: SATAWU has issued a Section 64 notice of intended industrial action affecting Transnet Freight Rail. Strike commences Monday if wage dispute is not resolved. Revenue impact estimated at R1.2bn per day.

title: Transnet Cable Theft Escalation - Northern Cape
message: Railway cable theft incidents in the Northern Cape have increased 340% in Q3 2024, severely disrupting iron ore export volumes from Sishen mine. Manganese corridor also affected. SAPS task team deployed.

title: Transnet Annual Report Approval Required
message: The 2023/24 Annual Report has been cleared by KPMG and is ready for Board approval before submission to the Department of Public Enterprises and Parliament. Board meeting scheduled for 25 October 2024.

title: Denel Salary Arrears - Critical Cash Flow
message: Denel is unable to meet the October 2021 salary payroll due to severe cash flow constraints. Emergency funding request of R3bn submitted to National Treasury and DPE. Employee representative bodies notified.

title: Denel Rooivalk Contract Delivery Delay
message: Production delay of 4 months confirmed on the Rooivalk export contract. Client has been notified. Penalty clause provisions reviewed with legal team. Recovery plan being submitted to Board by 15 January 2024.

title: Denel Key Engineer Exodus Alert
message: In the period July-September 2021, Denel has lost 86 critical engineers and technical specialists due to non-payment of salaries. This poses a significant risk to ongoing and future contracts. Urgent intervention required.

title: Denel Turnaround Plan Milestone Achieved
message: Denel has successfully completed Phase 1 of its 2022-2026 Turnaround Plan, meeting 7 of 9 key performance indicators. Financial stabilisation milestones met. Phase 2 commences January 2024.

title: PFMA Section 54 - Significant Transaction Approval Required
message: The proposed LMT-Denel partnership agreement exceeds R5bn in value and requires prior written approval from the Minister of Public Enterprises in terms of Section 54 of the PFMA. Submission to DPE by 30 July 2023.

title: New Chairperson Appointed - Eskom Board
message: Cabinet has approved the appointment of Mr Mteto Nyati as new Chairperson of the Eskom Board of Directors, effective 1 March 2024. Induction programme to be arranged by Company Secretary.

title: Parliamentary Portfolio Committee Hearing - Transnet
message: Transnet executives are required to appear before the Parliamentary Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises on 15 November 2024 to account for port performance and the Transnet Recovery Plan. Briefing document due by 8 November.

title: AGSA Audit Outcome - Qualified Opinion Issued
message: The Auditor-General of South Africa has issued a qualified audit opinion for Eskom FY2022/23 financial statements. Material findings relate to irregular expenditure of R4.2bn and revenue recognition matters. Management response required within 30 days.

title: SAA Carbon Offset Programme Launch
message: SAA has launched a voluntary carbon offset programme for passengers on domestic routes, partnering with South African forestry and renewable energy projects. Target: offset 15% of domestic aviation emissions by 2026.

title: Transnet Pipeline - Petroleum Product Supply Disruption
message: A pipeline rupture at Alrode, Alberton has caused a temporary suspension of petroleum product supply via the New Multi-Product Pipeline. Fuel retailers in Gauteng should activate contingency plans. Road tanker logistics being coordinated.

title: Denel Pension Fund Emergency Meeting
message: An emergency meeting of the Denel Pension Fund Board of Trustees has been called for 5 February 2024 to address the R2.5bn deficit and consider benefit suspension recommendations. Actuarial report attached.
